item.title: Unlocking User Insights with Posthog on Site Bay
item.description: In the digital realm of Site Bay’s WordPress hosting, understanding your audience’s behavior is paramount. Enter Posthog: an analytics tool that lets you peek into how users interact with your site, from page views to specific events.
